trans-unit.source: Represents audio input that is associated with a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 表示音频输入，它是与<xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A speech recognizer generates information about the audio input as part of the recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: 语音识别器生成的音频输入有关识别操作的一部分的信息。

trans-unit.source: To access the recognized audio, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Audio%2A> property or the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.GetAudioForWordRange%2A> method of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>.
trans-unit.target: 若要访问识别的音频，使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Audio%2A>属性或<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.GetAudioForWordRange%2A>方法的<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.GetAudioForWordRange%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Audio%2A>

trans-unit.source: A recognition result can be produced by the following events and methods of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> classes: - Events: - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechHypothesized?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechHypothesized?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognitionRejected?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeCompleted?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognizeCompleted?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted?displayProperty=fullName> - Methods: - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognize%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognize%2A?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Recognize%2A?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A?displayProperty=fullName> > [!IMPORTANT] > A recognition result produced by emulated speech recognition does not contain recognized audio.
trans-unit.target: 以下事件和方法可以生成识别结果<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>和<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>类:-事件:-<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechHypothesized?displayProperty=fullName>和<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechHypothesized?displayProperty=fullName>-<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected?displayProperty=fullName>和<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognitionRejected?displayProperty=fullName>-<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=fullName>和<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=fullName>-<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeCompleted?displayProperty=fullName>和<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognizeCompleted?displayProperty=fullName>-<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted?displayProperty=fullName>的方法:-<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>和<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>-<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A?displayProperty=fullName>和<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Recognize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A?displayProperty=fullName>1> [!IMPORTANT]&1;> A 识别由模拟的语音识别的结果不包含可识别的音频。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Recognize%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognize%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognize%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.EmulateRecognizeCompleted?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeCompleted?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognitionRejected?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechHypothesized?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechHypothesized?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>

trans-unit.source: For such a recognition result, its <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Audio%2A> property returns `null` and its <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.GetAudioForWordRange%2A> method throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: 此类识别结果，其<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Audio%2A>属性返回`null`及其<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.GetAudioForWordRange%2A>方法引发异常。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.GetAudioForWordRange%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Audio%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about emulated speech recognition, see the `EmulateRecognize` and `EmulateRecognizeAsync` methods of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> classes.
trans-unit.target: 有关模拟的语音识别的详细信息，请参阅`EmulateRecognize`和`EmulateRecognizeAsync`方法<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>和<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>类。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>

trans-unit.source: Gets the location in the input audio stream for the start of the recognized audio.
trans-unit.target: 为识别音频 start 获取输入音频流中的位置。

trans-unit.source: This property references the position at the beginning of the recognized phrase in the input device's generated audio stream.
trans-unit.target: 此属性引用所识别的短语中的输入的设备生成音频流开头的位置。

trans-unit.source: By contrast, the `RecognizerAudioPosition` property of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> classes reference the recognizer's position within its audio input.
trans-unit.target: 与此相反，`RecognizerAudioPosition`属性<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>和<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>类引用其音频的输入内识别器的位置。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>

trans-unit.source: These positions can be different.
trans-unit.target: 这些位置可以是不同的。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using Speech Recognition Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01c598ca-2e0e-4e89-b303-cd1cef9e8482).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[使用语音识别事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01c598ca-2e0e-4e89-b303-cd1cef9e8482)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedAudio.StartTime%2A> property gets the system time at the start of the recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedAudio.StartTime%2A>属性获取系统时间的识别操作的开头。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedAudio.StartTime%2A>

trans-unit.source: The location in the input audio stream for the start of the recognized audio.
trans-unit.target: 识别音频中输入音频流开头的位置。

trans-unit.source: Gets the duration of the input audio stream for the recognized audio.
trans-unit.target: 获取识别音频输入音频流的持续时间。

trans-unit.source: The duration within the input audio stream for the recognized audio.
trans-unit.target: 识别音频输入音频流中的时间。

trans-unit.source: Gets the format of the audio processed by a recognition engine.
trans-unit.target: 获取由识别引擎处理的音频格式。

trans-unit.source: The format of the audio processed by the speech recognizer.
trans-unit.target: 由语音识别器处理的音频格式。

trans-unit.source: Selects and returns a section of the current recognized audio as binary data.
trans-unit.target: 选择并返回当前识别中的一部分音频为二进制数据。

trans-unit.source: The starting point of the audio data to be returned.
trans-unit.target: 要返回的音频数据起始点。

trans-unit.source: The length of the segment to be returned.
trans-unit.target: 要返回的段的长度。

trans-unit.source: Returns a subsection of the recognized audio, as defined by audioPosition and duration.
trans-unit.target: 按照定义返回的子部分的可识别音频 audioPosition 和 duration 。

trans-unit.source: audioPosition and duration define a segment of audio outside the range of the current segment.
trans-unit.target: audioPosition和duration定义超出当前段的范围的音频的段。

trans-unit.source: The current recognized audio contains no data.
trans-unit.target: 当前识别音频不包含任何数据。

trans-unit.source: Gets the system time at the start of the recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: 在开始时识别操作获取系统时间。

trans-unit.source: The StartTime property gets the system time at the start of the recognition operation, which can be useful for latency and performance calculations.
trans-unit.target: 在开始时识别操作，这会非常有用的延迟和性能的计算，StartTime 属性获取系统时间。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedAudio.AudioPosition%2A> property gets the location in the input device's generated audio stream.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedAudio.AudioPosition%2A>属性获取中的输入的设备生成音频流的位置。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedAudio.AudioPosition%2A>

trans-unit.source: The system time at the start of the recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: 识别操作开始时系统时间。

trans-unit.source: Writes the entire audio to a stream as raw data.
trans-unit.target: 将整个音频作为原始数据写入流。

trans-unit.source: Audio data is written to `outputStream` in binary form.
trans-unit.target: 音频数据写入到`outputStream`以二进制形式。

trans-unit.source: No header information is included.
trans-unit.target: 不不包括任何标头信息。

trans-unit.source: The WriteToAudioStream method uses the Wave format, but does not include the Wave header.
trans-unit.target: WriteToAudioStream 方法使用批格式，但不包括批标头。

trans-unit.source: To include the Wave header, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedAudio.WriteToWaveStream%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要包括批标头，使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedAudio.WriteToWaveStream%2A>方法。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedAudio.WriteToWaveStream%2A>

trans-unit.source: The stream that will receive the audio data.
trans-unit.target: 将接收音频数据的流。

trans-unit.source: Writes audio to a stream in Wave format.
trans-unit.target: 音频写入波形格式的流。

trans-unit.source: Audio data is written to `outputStream` in Wave format, which includes a resource interchange file format (RIFF) header.
trans-unit.target: 音频数据写入到`outputStream`批格式，其中包括资源交换文件格式 (RIFF) 标头。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedAudio.WriteToAudioStream%2A> method uses the same binary format, but does not include the Wave header.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedAudio.WriteToAudioStream%2A>方法使用相同的二进制格式，但不包括批标头。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedAudio.WriteToAudioStream%2A>

trans-unit.source: The stream that will receive the audio data.
trans-unit.target: 将接收音频数据的流。
